item.name: get all insurance applications for a specific farmer
get all insurance applications for a inspector_id

body.raw:
{
  "policy_id": "policy123",
  "farmer_id": "pu89qoAhmiTlu3R6x8PDCVeluGK2",
  "land_id": "land456",
  "damage_type": "flood",
  "damage_date": "2023-06-15",
  "description": "Heavy rains caused flooding in my paddy fields",
  "evidence_files": ["flood1.jpg", "flood2.jpg"],
  "weather_data": "weather_screenshot.png"
}
